review: OMG.  Love this product so much.  I ordered during a promotional special so I received it at half-price, but had to wait several months for it to be delivered.  Well worth the wait. We can now take the ability to stream videos to a television wherever there is an internet connection.
author: Christina Willis

review: The fire stick lets my daughter watch YouTube videos on the tv, which means I now get to shower by myself while she sits in a trance like state watching other people play with play doh. Thanks, Amazon!
author: Taylor Gordon

review: This is just what I needed! I recommend this to anyone without a "smart tv" that wants to be able to watch Netflix, Hulu or anything else on it! Easy to set up and use!
author: Anndrea bishop

review: Could not be happier with the Fire Stick....have gotten hooked on 3 new shows that I would not have been able to watch....Great to have during the bad weather...don't have to go out to rent a movie....
author: CKSun

review: We love our Fire TV Stick!
author: Amy Bielema

review: I've had my Amazon Stick for a couple of weeks now and i really enjoy it and all its features. I would have given it 5 stars but the only dislike i have is the selecting cable providers for certain apps like Disney. I got this fire stick bc i no longer wanted the cable bill but it asks for your cable provider and then you have to put in a username and password. I would love if you were able to just do it like the other apps and put the code in and then have access to the shows. Other than that, i thoroughly enjoy it.
author: Shamika Sims
